reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: Support to UNFPA for humanitarian activities in Syria
Tuki YK:n vaestorahasto UNFPAn humanitaariseen toimintaan Syyriassa

description.narrative: Syria's humanitarian situation continues to be difficult. 13.7 million people are in need of humanitarian assistance. In addition 5.7 million people are refugees in neighbouring countries.The humanitarian appeal for 2019 is about $3.5 billion. Total requir ements are estimated at $9.1 billion in the regional humanitarian appeal.Finland's humanitarian aid to Syria in 2019 amounts to 12.4 million euros. This is allocated through UNHCR WFP UNFPA International Red Cross Movement Finn Church Aid and FIDA. Finland has pledged to Syria with a total of 25 million euros in 2019.In Syria UNFPA supports sexual and reproductive health services works on preventing gender-based violence and provides services in women's and girls' safety centres as well as in youth centres and health services.

tag.narrative: Strengthening of the rights and status of women and girls is the main priority area in this activ ity
